SnapPass is a fast, simple, and reliable password generator extension that helps you create unique and strong passwords for your online accounts.

➤ Features:
• Generate secure and random passwords: SnapPass uses advanced algorithms to generate passwords that are unique, strong, and difficult to crack.
• Quick and easy to use: With just a click of a button, you can generate a secure and random password.
• Customize your passwords: SnapPass allows you to customize your passwords by adjusting the length, complexity, and character types.
• No storage of passwords: SnapPass does not store or save any passwords that are generated.

➤ How it works:
SnapPass uses the Web Crypto API to generate secure and random passwords. When you click the "Generate Password" button, SnapPass uses advanced algorithms to generate a password that is unique and difficult to guess or crack. You can customize your password by adjusting the length, complexity, and character types.

SnapPass does not store or save any passwords that are generated. This ensures that your passwords are secure and private.

Download SnapPass now and start generating strong and secure passwords in seconds!

➤ Support:
Please contact us if you have any questions, issues or suggestions.
